name: Skip (itch)
description:
This game is basically a much worse prototype of my other game, Grid Shift. I strongly recommend you try that instead. This is just here for memories, and to see how far it's come.
And, of course, Pride.

Collect all the objects in the fewest number of moves, but there's a twist—every move moves you over by 2 spaces, not 1!

WASD or arrows to move, R to reset, M to menu.

Enjoy!
